item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, April 5, 2025 at 3:30 AM UTC
item.description:
1. AT&T Email-to-Text Gateway Service Ending June 17 (65 points | 36 comments)
2. Learn electricity and electronics fundamentals without taking a formal course (38 points | 6 comments)
3. OpenVertebrate Presents a Database of 13,000 3D Scans of Specimens (14 points | 3 comments)
4. The blissful Zen of a good side project (197 points | 52 comments)
5. Understanding Machine Learning: From Theory to Algorithms (250 points | 34 comments)
6. Coolify: Open-source and self-hostable Heroku / Netlify / Vercel alternative (116 points | 46 comments)
7. The End of Sierra as We Knew It, Part 1: The Acquisition (179 points | 58 comments)
8. An interactive-speed Linux computer made of only 3 8-pin chips (194 points | 73 comments)
9. Increasing Timber Production, an Emergency Situation on National Forest Lands [pdf] (25 points | 10 comments)
10. Show HN: uWrap.js – A faster and more accurate text wrapping util in < 2KB (49 points | 9 comments)
11. Annotated Unix Magic Poster (29 points | 2 comments)
12. Show HN: Clawtype v2.1 – a one-hand chorded USB keyboard and mouse [video] (27 points | 4 comments)
13. Why Does Claude Speak Byzantine Music Notation? (74 points | 35 comments)
14. The Tcl Programming Language: A Comprehensive Guide (2nd Edition) (85 points | 54 comments)
15. Kerosene did not save the sperm whale (2024) (154 points | 52 comments)
16. Minecraft Server in FreeBSD Jails Container (8 points | 1 comment)
17. The 'Judicial Black Hole' of El Salvador's Prisons Is a Warning for Americans (197 points | 62 comments)
18. Mercantilism (37 points | 12 comments)
19. How Airbnb measures listing lifetime value (53 points | 70 comments)
20. Intuiting TLS (9 points | 3 comments)
21. Microsoft’s original source code (544 points | 286 comments)
22. Scaling Up Reinforcement Learning for Traffic Smoothing (23 points | 14 comments)
23. New antibiotic that kills drug-resistant bacteria found in technician's garden (367 points | 258 comments)
24. The Fifth Kind of Optimisation (17 points | 13 comments)
25. The Soul of an Old Machine (7 points | discuss)
26. Thunder Compute (YC S24) is hiring a GPU systems engineer ( | hide)
27. Study finds solo music listening boosts social well-being (243 points | 101 comments)
28. Google announces Sec-Gemini v1 a new experimental cybersecurity model (119 points | 27 comments)
29. Gumroad’s source is available (436 points | 189 comments)
30. Investigating MacPaint's Source Code (8 points | discuss)
